SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , T.* FROM(SELECT Q_NO , Q_TITLE , Q_HIT , Q.CREATE_DATE , Q_CONTENT , USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NAME , CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , A_NO , A_CONTENT , A_CREATE_DATE , A.STATUS A_STATUS FROM QUESTION Q JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN ANSWER A USING(Q_NO) WHERE Q.STATUS = 'N'
AND CATEGORY_NO = 10
AND CATEGORY_NO = 20
AND CATEGORY_NO = 30
AND A_NO IS NULL
AND A_NO IS NOT NULL AND A.STATUS = 'N'
ORDER BY Q_NO DESC) T) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT Q_NO , Q_TITLE , Q_HIT , Q.CREATE_DATE , Q_CONTENT , USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NAME , CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , A_NO , A_CONTENT , A_CREATE_DATE , A.STATUS A_STATUS FROM QUESTION Q JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN ANSWER A USING(Q_NO) WHERE Q_NO = #{ no }

AND CATEGORY_NO = 10
AND CATEGORY_NO = 20
AND CATEGORY_NO = 30
